name: Port Royale 3
description: Develop a successful trading company, lead your ships in naval battles and force your opponents to their knees!
minimum_requirements: OS:Windowx XP / Vista / 7 Processor:Dualcore CPU Memory:2 GB RAM Graphics:Shader Model 2.0 PCIe (Geforce 7 Series, Radeon X2000-Series) DirectX®:dx90c Hard Drive:3 GB HD space Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
recommended_requirements: OS:Windows 7 Processor:Quadcore CPU Memory:4 GB RAM Graphics:Shader Model 3.0 PCIe, DirectX 10 DirectX®:dx10 Hard Drive:3 GB HD space Other Requirements:Broadband Internet connection
